transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello Suman sir?
Customer: Hello? Ji ji boliye. Haan ji. Ji boliye. Pawan baat kar raha tha jo video call kiya tha na abhi aapko. Main ye keh raha hu sir ek baar ye jo network hai jo hamara. Nahi nahi abhi abhi show kar raha hai main abhi check kar raha hu na.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Accha. Accha. Abhi abhi check karo. Maine abhi yes abhi check kiya.
Customer: Bhi chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan. Chalne laga?
Customer: Haan haan chalne laga. Chalne laga?
Executive: Accha accha. Kyunki sir yaha pe na abhi turant hai na. To ye cheez tha. Agar in future koi bhi problem aati hai na jis number se maine aapko WhatsApp calling ki thi, theek hai? Aap us number se call back kar lijiyega, theek hai? Ya mere ko WhatsApp bhi bhejega, theek hai sir? Aisa dikkat aisa dikkat kya aa gaya tha?
Customer: Sir kuch nahi. Ek baar na humne ye aapka ek baar reboosting kiya hua hai, samajh gaye aap meri baat? Uska matlab?
Executive: Haan aisa tha ki aap jis network se kaam chal raha tha na sir, jaise aap Jio ya Airtel kaun sa sim use kar rahe hai?
Customer: Main mobile mein koi problem nahi. Application mein bhi koi problem nahi thi hamara. Hamare na application mein problem thi na mobile mein aapke problem hai, theek hai sir? Aap jis network se chal raha hai na aapka ye jo wifi ya jo bhi hai, usme problem thi. Clear ho gaya?
Customer: Clear hua?
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Haan Suman sir kaun sa tha sir network thoda sa wo bata do.
Customer: Main Jio Jio se kar raha tha.
Executive: Accha. Abhi aapne dusre koi dusra sim bhi hai kya aapke paas network wala?
Customer: Nahi nahi basically kya hai main kahin bahar aaya tha waha pe wifi use kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan ruko ruko ruko sir ruko. Ye problem mobile ki nahi hai. Aap samajh gaye? Ye ye problem IndiaMART ki bhi nahi hai. Ye problem Jio ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Clear hua? Ye problem Jio ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai. Hai na sir? Haan ji haan ji. Is problem se aapko aa gayi na. Yaha pe wifi wo use kar raha tha.
Customer: Aapne wifi jaise use kiya hoga to chal raha hoga aapko pura khul raha hoga. Haan abhi ye chalna start ho gaya haan.
Executive: Ab ab jaise aap Jio se connect karoge na phir problem karega. Clear ho gaya? To thoda sa net ka dusra aapke paas ya koi hai usko aap use kijiyega, theek hai? Kuch IndiaMART ki taraf se problem nahi hai. Theek hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai? Theek hai theek hai sir. Ek cheez aur hai aapki na ek complaint open thi, theek hai sir? Aapki complaint open thi matlab aapne customer care se call kiya tha na sir? To aapki ek complaint open ho gayi thi wo main close karunga, theek hai sir? To uska feedback aayega aapke paas to us pe aap revert kar sakte hai.
Customer: Theek theek hai.
Executive: Aapne customer care pe call kiya tha na sir ye wala problem ke liye?
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Hai na? To haan to wo complaint open ho gayi thi, theek hai sir? Aapki complaint open ho gayi thi. To main us complaint ko close karunga to wo feedback aayega ki aapke complaint pe hum log ne kaam kiya to us pe aap revert kar dijiyega, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Ye network ki problem hai, theek hai sir? Itna to humne nikal liya. Theek hai okay sir. Theek hai sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's network was not working properly.



Resolution:

- Executive identified the issue as a network problem.

- Executive suggested using a different network.

- Executive will close the customer's open complaint.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- network issue, complaint, customer care
